text: Annual Prime membership $29.99 auto-renewed on November 8 without notification. Want to downgrade to monthly $14.99 subscription instead.
I see the charge after cancellation date. That's billing error. Processing $249.99 refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Enrolled in 30-day free trial on November 21. Got charged $139 immediately instead of after trial period. Trial supposed to be free.
Free trial shouldn't charge upfront. That's incorrect billing. I'll refund $139 immediately and restart your 30-day trial period correctly.
Credit card statement shows $89.99 charge on November 11 but I cancelled Prime membership on October 18. Need refund for unauthorized billing.
I can switch your billing from $139 annual to $14.99 monthly. Next charge will be November 4 at monthly rate. Prorated refund processing.
Subscribed to Prime Student discount $14.99 annually. Graduated last month. Need to switch to regular Prime membership billing.
